ygData.subject: Re: Question, Re: [EverQuest] Re: Wizard Poll
ygData.msgSnippet: try putting a few practice points into it.. cause as a wizard, or any pure magic user ( non-tanks ),will never come close to using it enough to level up on it
ygData.messageBody:
try putting a few practice points into it.. cause as a wizard, or any pure
magic user ( non-tanks ),will never come close to using it enough to level
up on it naturally, unlike shamans or clerics.... just my thougths on the
matter..

Lance

-----Original Message-----
From: J. T. [mailto:aeris52@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 4:12 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Question, Re: [EverQuest] Re: Wizard Poll


From: "J. T." <aeris52@...>


>2H blunt... get it pratice it, use it... hehe
>
>You can always use a piercing weapon later in the game cause thats what you
>are limited to in the beginning. Hence you will probably have piercing
>skill
>maxed out , due to your high int. Most weapons ( if you use any at all )
>later on in the game will be 2H blunt weapons, therefore its best to get
>yourself a worn great staff as soon as you can and build your skill for
>your
>future 2H staffs.
>
>Lance


i made the mistake of not choosing a 2hblunt weapon early in the game, and
now im level 15 with a skilll of 36, i beiilve,is there any advice any one
could give me on what to do, its not that imp for me as a wizard, but every
hit counts :)!
Aile
Level 15 wizard of cazic thule
